reviews.title: Great place
reviews.text: Very nice hotel..
Stayed here for 2 nights whilst in Agra.
reviews.title: Loved it!
dirty room
reviews.text: Lovely room, very much a business hotel rather than tourist, but still comfortable.
Lovely food in restaurant and good service. Would recommend it.
reviews.title: Cleanliness much to be desired!
I will stay there again
reviews.text: Room and pool areas both clean
I stayed just 1 night at the hotel, and left really early.
reviews.title: Nice, but pricy

likes.disliked: — non working internet at my visit.

reviews.text: There room was clean, but had the "usual" lack of attention to details that are frequent in (Indian) hotels. Loose sockets, incontinently located hangers and so on.
reviews.title: Good place to be, value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2004, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nice bed, nice linen, good sofa. The beauty parlor was not good. Manicure and henna hand tattoo was very low quality.
reviews.title: Enjoyed the stay!!!

likes.disliked: — The decor was a little rugged

reviews.text: The indian restaurant was not bad. I didn't try the breakfast as I had to catch a flight early in the morning.
reviews.title: Great holiday inn!

likes.liked: — Everything, it was more like a 4star than a normal 3star HI
likes.disliked: — Could hear noisy traffic in room

reviews.text: The Holiday Inn is near the Old centre of Agra, not near the other 5 star hotels, so you will have to do the Taj Mahal with a taxi.
reviews.title: Theft at Holiday Inn Agra

likes.liked: — Theft At the hotel & untrained staff
likes.disliked: — Theft At the hotel & non-cooperation by the Staff

reviews.text: Hotel OK, nothing special. Food very expensive and the staff not very helpful.
reviews.title: Agra and The Taj Mahal
Great Hotel
reviews.text: The hotel is away from the main tourist area, but taxi's are cheap to go anywhere you want.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would consider using one of the India Hotels such as Jay Pee next time.
reviews.title: Pretty Good for Low Cost
Amazing Holiday Inn!
reviews.text: Worth any suffering to see the Taj Mahal.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I really liked this hotel. It is a step above the normal Holiday Inn you would see in the USA. The price is very good. The food was reasonably-priced and the staff was competent. We were pleasantly surprised that they upgraded us to a suite when we checked in. The only down-side to the hotel is that it is quite far (time-wise) from the Taj considering the congested traffic.
reviews.title: Sub-standard Holiday Inn

reviews.text: While not a particular fan of Holiday Inns in the US, I found this place sufficiently "Indian" and very pleasant. The staff was particularly helpful and friendly and the room was well-appointed and comfortable. I stayed there for two nights and had the buffet breakfast which I thought was fine. Quite a bit to choose from...traditional Western and Asian selections. I would recommend this place.
reviews.title: Pleasant place...

reviews.text: decent hotel for the right price. Good location, i do agree with the poor quality of towels remark. However, in general, hotel was nice. I found the staff to be friendly. I would recommend it.
reviews.title: Decent hotel for a reasonable price
Nice hotel, but too far from the Taj Mahal
reviews.text: The hotel looked and felt like a Holiday Inn from the U.S., which was a little disconcerting. The staff was helpful and courteous, the room clean and nicely appointed, and the restaurant was fine.
Downsides:
reviews.title: Pathetic Place, Full of thugs and thieves, Poor management

reviews.text: - Distance from Taj Mahal, about half hour away due to horribly congested road
reviews.title: Decent place for a short stopover
